impairment . portable device allows task-specific motor rehabilitation outside clinical setting , improving upper-limb mobility recovering injury stroke . beyond healthcare , also hold potential augmenting human performance demanding application space mission industrial task . spacesuit roboglove nasa second-generation spacesuit roboglove ( ssrg ) represents significant leap spacesuit benefit industry requiring repetitive intricate hand movement , manufacturing healthcare . wearable rfid sensor tag nasa wearable rfid ( radio frequency identification ) sensor tag use title: growing algae mars
content: 's long way mars , explorer headed either take enough food supply last whole trip use in-situ resource make need . recent esa discovery project led universitat de val ncia explored whether microalgae extracted lichen could survive mars used produce oxygen , food useful substance . although lichen look like single organism , contain two more specie living cooperatively together . lichen contains fungus ( mycobiont ) symbiotic relationship least one organism photosynthesise ( photobiont ) green microalga cyanobacterium . lichen survive extremely challenging condition , including exposure space environment . applies microalgae contain , extracted cultivated independently , liquid solid medium . 's possible , therefore , could survive thrive under mars condition used produce resource support human presence . many specie microalgae found lichen belong trebouxiaceae family . 'trebouxiaceae novel candidate survive mars : assessment resistance ability produce biomass , derived interest compound small-medium scale using situ resource ' project examined ability lichen microalgae survive produce biomass mars . `` n't really know much microalgae , even though present environment over planet , `` say principal investigator marta p rez-rodrigo , phd candidate universitat de val ncia . `` knowing resist martian condition help u explore theory whether organism could travel one planet another . culture microalgae autonomous system mars , during space mission , open up many possibility , providing astronaut food oxygen , protecting harmful radiation . `` result showed lichen microalgae completely withstand individual stress , including exposure uv radiation , freezing temperature ( -80 c ) , simulated martian soil high level iron oxide simulated martian atmosphere . microalgae recover rapidly after exposure return healthy growth . specie also tolerate cellular ( osmotic ) stress associated drought extremely salty water . lichen microalgae molecular mechanism allow respond challenging condition , including production high level sugar alcohol . would possible transport mars maintain , high nutritional value make good choice producing food space . `` research address one key challenge u becoming interplanetary specie , `` say moritz fontaine , discovery & preparation officer esa 's lead project . `` even going moon , need understand how living organism provide nutritional element astronaut help maintain closed-loop environmental system . `` next stage research investigate whether possible use synthetic biology technique create new strain lichen microalgae produce variety useful substance . project came idea submitted through esa 's open space innovation platform , seeking promising new idea space research , funded discovery element esa 's basic activity . thank liking already liked page , like !

title: proba-3 stargazing warm up corona observation
content: european space agency proba-3 mission create artificial solar eclipse orbit , allowing scientist study sun corona longer period time would possible during eclipse observed earth . test functionality proba-3 system , researcher royal observatory belgium took snapshot star field very first image captured mission coronagraph . take image solar corona , proba-3 carry aspiics , short association spacecraft polarimetric imaging investigation corona sun . instrument , developed esa centre spatial de li ge , belgium , made up large occulting disk mounted occulter spacecraft solar coronagraph system carried coronagraph spacecraft . most precise formation , coronagraph occulter flying 150 apart , maintaining relative position down single millimetre . occulting disk cover bright body sun , casting shadow onto optical instrument coronagraph spacecraft allowing study solar corona . following launch 5 december , two satellite remained attached separation 14 january . mission control team esa european space security education centre belgium managed initial in-orbit commissioning . spacecraft still attached , team tested accuracy mission pointing . essentially , operator rotated spacecraft telling star facing . aspiics image star field used verify pointing correct . andrei zhukov , principal investigator aspiics coronagraph royal observatory belgium , explains : looked star map see star would visible proba-3 specific date . choosing single star would not enough , not sure star looking . ideally , want least three star triangle like give full orientation information . chose two bright star constellation ophiuchus meaning serpent-bearer ancient greek marked greek letter ( delta ) ( epsilon ) . situated close enough fit aspiics image , together few weaker star . ophiuchus constellation actually visible naked eye anywhere earth . andrei asked control team point spacecraft towards star capture image star field using coronagraph optical instrument . excellent precision , spacecraft pointed exactly where asked . when got image , saw two star straight away . very sharp great news , mean during ten second took capture image , spacecraft very stable . least eight star visible aspiics image , enough confirm pointing telescope . positioning spacecraft precisely crucial observing corona . alignment even few millimetre , sun not fully covered occulter , leading unwanted light interrupting observation . precise alignment , . -m large disc occulter spacecraft external occulter fully cover sun . even , however , so-called stray light spill over occulter edge , creating haze would interfere corona observation . block stray light , coronagraph equipped another , internal occulter . star field image , internal occulter visible black ring , corresponding blackened section one coronagraph lens . andrei add : also see cosmic ray image , marked purple . normal coronagraph image , cosmic ray hit often look like star . second image taken time apart one , star stay , cosmic ray appear different location . overall , very pleased accuracy spacecraft pointing quality image . made u even more excited see corona image , expected early march . royal observatory belgium hosting aspiics science operation centre ( soc ) dedicated team responsible creating operational command coronagraph based request scientific community sharing resulting observation . thank liking already liked page , like !
